clinical_features.SAFARI: Subintimal Arterial Flossing with Antegrade-Retrograde Intervention

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

clinical_pearls: Anterior tibial is preferred access for SFA CTOs
Always use ultrasound guidance for tibial/pedal puncture
Consider early conversion to retrograde rather than prolonged antegrade attempts
